welcomePage.title: Welcome to EgyTwins Visitor Management System
welcomePage.description: We're thrilled to have you here. At EgyTwins, we prioritize your safety and convenience. Our Visitor Management System is designed to streamline your check-in process, ensuring a seamless and secure visit.
steps: Enter your details
Capture your photo
Print your visitor badge
welcomePage.noteDescription: Your security is our top priority. Rest assured, your information is securely stored and will only be used for safety purposes.
welcomePage.helpDescription: Our friendly staff is here to help you every step of the way. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any assistance.
welcomePage.closingMessage: Thank you for choosing EgyTwins. We hope you have a pleasant and productive visit.

userRegistration.title: User Registration for EgyTwins Visitor Management System
userRegistration.description: Thank you for choosing EgyTwins. To ensure a smooth and secure visit, we kindly ask you to complete the registration process.
steps: Fill in your personal details
Provide a valid ID for verification
Set up your visit preferences
Create a secure password
userRegistration.noteDescription: Your privacy is paramount to us. All information provided is protected and will only be used for official visitation and security purposes.
userRegistration.helpDescription: Our support team is ready to assist you. If you encounter any issues or have questions, feel free to contact us.
userRegistration.closingMessage: We look forward to your visit at EgyTwins and are committed to providing a safe and enjoyable experience.

loginProcess.title: Login Process for EgyTwins Visitor Management System
loginProcess.description: Access your personalized dashboard and manage your visits efficiently by logging into your account.
steps: Enter your username
Input your password
Click 'Login' to access your dashboard
loginProcess.noteDescription: Your account security is crucial. Remember to keep your login details confidential and log out after each session.
loginProcess.helpDescription: If you're having trouble logging in, our support team is here to help. Contact us for immediate assistance.
loginProcess.closingMessage: Enjoy the benefits of streamlined visitor management with EgyTwins.

dashboardOverview.title: Dashboard Overview for EgyTwins Visitor Management System
dashboardOverview.description: Your dashboard is the hub for all your visitor management activities. Get quick access to your visits, manage appointments, and more.
steps: Overview of upcoming and past visits
Manage your personal details
Access visitor reports and analytics
dashboardOverview.noteDescription: We've designed the dashboard to be intuitive and user-friendly, ensuring you can find what you need with ease.
dashboardOverview.helpDescription: If you need help navigating your dashboard, our team is ready to provide support.
dashboardOverview.closingMessage: Make the most of your EgyTwins experience with a tailored dashboard.

navigatingTheSoftware.title: Navigating the EgyTwins Visitor Management System
navigatingTheSoftware.description: A guide to help you navigate through the various features and functionalities of our system.
steps: Utilize the main menu for quick access to different modules
Use the search function to find specific information quickly
Customize your dashboard for a personalized experience
navigatingTheSoftware.noteDescription: Our system is designed with user experience in mind, ensuring a smooth navigation process.
navigatingTheSoftware.helpDescription: If you're finding it challenging to navigate the system, our support team is here for guidance.
navigatingTheSoftware.closingMessage: Navigate EgyTwins with confidence and ease.

userRolesAndPermissions.title: User Roles and Permissions in EgyTwins System
userRolesAndPermissions.description: An overview of different user roles in our system and the permissions associated with each.
steps: Identify different user roles: Visitor, Host, Admin
Understand the specific permissions for each role
Learn how to change or request changes to your role
userRolesAndPermissions.noteDescription: Roles and permissions are set to provide a secure and efficient user experience.
userRolesAndPermissions.helpDescription: If you have any questions regarding your role or permissions, our support team is ready to assist.
userRolesAndPermissions.closingMessage: Enjoy a tailored experience with role-specific access and functionalities.

addingANewVisitor.title: Adding a New Visitor in EgyTwins System
addingANewVisitor.description: Step by step guide on how to add a new visitor into the EgyTwins Visitor Management System.
steps: Enter the visitor's personal information
Specify the date and purpose of the visit
Assign a host and confirm visitor details
addingANewVisitor.noteDescription: Adding visitors is streamlined for efficiency and ease.
addingANewVisitor.helpDescription: Our support team can guide you through the process of adding new visitors.
addingANewVisitor.closingMessage: Effortlessly add visitors and enhance the experience at EgyTwins.

checkInProcess.title: Check-In Process in EgyTwins System
checkInProcess.description: A quick and efficient process to check in visitors upon their arrival.
steps: Verify the visitor's identity and purpose of visit
Capture a photo for the visitor badge
Print the visitor badge and provide any necessary instructions
checkInProcess.noteDescription: Our check-in process is designed to be both quick and secure, ensuring a smooth start to every visit.
checkInProcess.helpDescription: For any help during the check-in process, our staff is readily available to assist.
checkInProcess.closingMessage: Welcome to EgyTwins, where your visit begins with ease.

checkOutProcess.title: Check-Out Process in EgyTwins System
checkOutProcess.description: Simple steps to check out visitors, ensuring a complete record of their visit.
steps: Visitor confirms departure with the host or at a check-out kiosk
Return any visitor badges or equipment
Visitor's departure is logged in the system for records
checkOutProcess.noteDescription: Our check-out process is quick and organized, providing a smooth conclusion to each visit.
checkOutProcess.helpDescription: Our team is available to assist with any check-out queries or processes.
checkOutProcess.closingMessage: Thank you for visiting EgyTwins. We hope to see you again soon!

blockVisitor.title: Block Visitor in EgyTwins System
blockVisitor.description: Steps to block a visitor from accessing the premises, ensuring the safety and security of all.
steps: Identify the visitor to be blocked
Provide a reason for the block
Confirm the block in the system
blockVisitor.noteDescription: This feature is crucial for maintaining a safe and secure environment at EgyTwins.
blockVisitor.helpDescription: For guidance on how to block a visitor, please contact our support team.
blockVisitor.closingMessage: EgyTwins remains committed to a secure and safe environment.

visitorQrPrinting.title: Visitor QR Printing in EgyTwins System
visitorQrPrinting.description: Facilitate visitor movements within the premises using QR code technology.
steps: Generate a QR code upon visitor check-in
Visitor uses QR code for access to designated areas
QR code helps in tracking visitor movement within the premises
visitorQrPrinting.noteDescription: QR codes enhance the efficiency and security of visitor management at EgyTwins.
visitorQrPrinting.helpDescription: If you encounter any issues with QR code generation or usage, contact our support team.
visitorQrPrinting.closingMessage: EgyTwins employs advanced technology for enhanced visitor management.

managingHosts.title: Managing Hosts in EgyTwins System
managingHosts.description: Manage and coordinate hosts within your organization to ensure a smooth visitor experience.
steps: Add or remove hosts as needed
Assign hosts to specific visitors or groups
Monitor host availability and activity
managingHosts.noteDescription: Our system streamlines the management of hosts, facilitating efficient visitor coordination.
managingHosts.helpDescription: For any queries related to managing hosts, our team is available to assist.
managingHosts.closingMessage: Efficiently manage your hosts with EgyTwins for a seamless visitor experience.

sectors.title: Sectors Management in EgyTwins System
sectors.description: Define and manage various sectors within your organization for better visitor direction and management.
steps: Create and define sectors within the premises
Assign specific hosts or services to each sector
Update sector information as needed
sectors.noteDescription: Sectors organization helps in managing visitor flow and activities within different areas.
sectors.helpDescription: Our support team can assist with any queries regarding sector management.
sectors.closingMessage: Organize and manage your organizational sectors efficiently with EgyTwins.

buildings.title: Building Management in EgyTwins System
buildings.description: Manage all the buildings in your organization, ensuring they are properly allocated for various visitor-related activities.
steps: List all buildings and their specific functions
Allocate and manage spaces within each building
Update building details as required
buildings.noteDescription: Effectively manage your buildings to optimize space and enhance visitor experience.
buildings.helpDescription: For support in managing your buildings, reach out to our helpdesk.
buildings.closingMessage: Manage your buildings effectively with the EgyTwins Visitor Management System.

floors.title: Floor Management in EgyTwins System
floors.description: Organize and manage the floors in your buildings to facilitate easy navigation and efficient space utilization.
steps: Catalogue each floor with specific details
Assign functions or departments to each floor
Update floor information for visitors' convenience
floors.noteDescription: Proper management of floors enhances the visitor experience and operational efficiency.
floors.helpDescription: For any questions about floor management, our support team is here to help.
floors.closingMessage: Optimize your space with EgyTwins floor management.

units.title: Unit Management in EgyTwins System
units.description: Manage the different units within your organization to streamline operations and visitor handling.
steps: Define and list all units within the organization
Assign specific roles or activities to each unit
Keep unit information up-to-date for effective management
units.noteDescription: Clear unit management aids in smooth operations and visitor services.
units.helpDescription: Our team is available to provide assistance and answer any queries regarding unit management.
units.closingMessage: Ensure effective unit organization with EgyTwins.

gates.title: Gate Management in EgyTwins System
gates.description: Effectively manage the gates within your premises to ensure secure and regulated access for visitors.
steps: List all access points and their specific controls
Monitor and manage gate usage
Implement security protocols at each gate
gates.noteDescription: Gate management is crucial for maintaining the security and orderliness of your premises.
gates.helpDescription: For guidance on gate management and security, contact our support staff.
gates.closingMessage: Maintain secure and efficient access with EgyTwins gate management.

devices.title: Device Management in EgyTwins System
devices.description: Handle all the devices within your system, ensuring they are optimally used and maintained for visitor management.
steps: List and categorize all devices used in the system
Monitor device status and schedule regular maintenance
Upgrade or replace devices as per technological advancements
devices.noteDescription: Effective device management is key to maintaining a high standard of visitor service.
devices.helpDescription: Our technical team is ready to assist with any questions regarding device management.
devices.closingMessage: Leverage modern technology efficiently with EgyTwins device management.

companies.title: Company Management in EgyTwins System
companies.description: Manage the profiles of different companies or entities that interact with your system.
steps: Create and maintain profiles for each company
Update company information as needed
Manage company-specific visitor protocols
companies.noteDescription: Keeping company profiles updated ensures smooth collaboration and visitor handling.
companies.helpDescription: Contact our support team for assistance in managing company profiles.
companies.closingMessage: Enhance collaboration with effective company management in EgyTwins.

deviceTypes.title: Device Type Management in EgyTwins System
deviceTypes.description: Manage various types of devices used in your system for a streamlined visitor management process.
steps: Identify and list different types of devices
Assign specific functions to each device type
Regularly review and update device type categorizations
deviceTypes.noteDescription: Proper categorization of device types aids in their effective utilization and maintenance.
deviceTypes.helpDescription: Our technical support team can assist with any questions about device types.
deviceTypes.closingMessage: Efficiently manage device types for optimal visitor management in EgyTwins.

blacklist.title: Blacklist Management in EgyTwins System
blacklist.description: Effectively manage a blacklist to ensure the safety and security of your premises.
steps: Add individuals or entities to the blacklist as necessary
Regularly review and update the blacklist
Ensure compliance with legal and ethical standards
blacklist.noteDescription: Blacklist management is a critical aspect of maintaining a secure and compliant environment.
blacklist.helpDescription: For guidance on managing the blacklist, please consult our security team.
blacklist.closingMessage: EgyTwins is committed to a secure and responsible visitor management system.

managingAppointments.title: Managing Appointments in EgyTwins System
managingAppointments.description: Efficiently schedule and manage appointments within the EgyTwins system for optimal visitor coordination.
steps: Schedule new appointments using the system calendar
Send automatic reminders to visitors and hosts
Easily reschedule or cancel appointments as needed
managingAppointments.noteDescription: Our appointment management system ensures smooth scheduling and communication between visitors and hosts.
managingAppointments.helpDescription: For assistance with scheduling or managing appointments, please contact our support team.
managingAppointments.closingMessage: Ensure a seamless visitor experience with efficient appointment management.

kiosk.title: Kiosk Operations in EgyTwins System
kiosk.description: Utilize the self-service kiosk for efficient visitor management, enhancing user independence and reducing wait times.
steps: Visitors can check-in or check-out using the kiosk
Print visitor badges and QR codes directly from the kiosk
Access information and directions through the kiosk interface
kiosk.noteDescription: Kiosks provide a quick and user-friendly way for visitors to manage their visit without assistance.
kiosk.helpDescription: For help with the kiosk or its features, our staff is always ready to assist.
kiosk.closingMessage: Experience the convenience of self-service with EgyTwins kiosks.

operator.title: Operator Functions in EgyTwins System
operator.description: Operators can access advanced features and settings to effectively manage the visitor management system.
steps: Oversee visitor check-ins and check-outs
Manage system settings and user roles
Generate reports and analyze visitor data
operator.noteDescription: Operator functions provide complete control over the visitor management system, ensuring efficient operation.
operator.helpDescription: Our technical team is available to provide support to system operators as needed.
operator.closingMessage: Administer the EgyTwins system effectively with comprehensive operator tools.

welcome.title: Welcome to EgyTwins Kiosk
welcome.description: Effortlessly check-in, print badges, and navigate your visit using our intuitive kiosk.
steps: Touch the screen to begin
Follow the prompts to enter your details
Print your badge and enjoy your visit
welcome.noteDescription: Our kiosk is designed for ease of use, offering a seamless self-service experience.
welcome.helpDescription: If you need help using the kiosk, our staff is available to guide you.
welcome.closingMessage: Thank you for using the EgyTwins Kiosk for a swift and easy check-in.

createTodayInvitation.title: Create Today's Invitation at EgyTwins Kiosk
createTodayInvitation.description: Quickly generate an invitation for visitors arriving today.
steps: Select 'Create Today's Invitation'
Enter the visitor's details and visit purpose
Confirm the invitation and notify the visitor
createTodayInvitation.noteDescription: This feature allows for instant creation and confirmation of visitor invitations.
createTodayInvitation.helpDescription: For assistance with creating an invitation, please reach out to our staff.
createTodayInvitation.closingMessage: Efficiently manage same-day visits with instant invitations.

createUpcomingVisit.title: Upcoming Visit Management
createUpcomingVisit.description: Efficiently handle and prepare for upcoming visitor arrivals.
steps: Navigate to 'Upcoming Visits' section
Review and verify upcoming visitor details
Prepare necessary resources and accommodations
createUpcomingVisit.noteDescription: Ensure a smooth experience by preparing for upcoming visitor arrivals in advance.
createUpcomingVisit.helpDescription: If you need assistance with managing upcoming visits, our team is here to help.
createUpcomingVisit.closingMessage: Stay organized and provide a welcoming experience for scheduled visitors.

searchVisits.title: Search Visits at EgyTwins Kiosk
searchVisits.description: Locate and review details of scheduled visits quickly using the kiosk.
steps: Select the 'Search Visits' option
Enter the search criteria for the visit
View and manage the visit details
searchVisits.noteDescription: Our kiosk enables quick access to visit information, streamlining the visitor management process.
searchVisits.helpDescription: If you need assistance in searching for visit details, our staff is here to help.
searchVisits.closingMessage: Find and manage visit information easily with the EgyTwins Kiosk.

login.title: Operator Login in EgyTwins System
login.description: Operators can log in to access and manage the system's advanced features.
steps: Enter operator credentials
Verify identity if prompted
Access the operator dashboard
login.noteDescription: Operator login is protected with advanced security protocols to ensure system integrity.
login.helpDescription: For any login-related problems, please contact our technical support team.
login.closingMessage: Secure and efficient system access for authorized operators.

editInformationData.title: Edit Information Data in EgyTwins System
editInformationData.description: Operators have the ability to edit and update information data within the system for accurate record-keeping.
steps: Navigate to the data management section
Select the information to be edited
Update the data and save changes
editInformationData.noteDescription: Maintaining accurate and up-to-date information is crucial for effective visitor management.
editInformationData.helpDescription: Our technical team is available to assist with data editing and management.
editInformationData.closingMessage: Ensure the accuracy and integrity of system data with proficient editing tools.

cancelVisit.title: Cancel Visit in EgyTwins System
cancelVisit.description: Operators have the ability to cancel scheduled visits, ensuring up-to-date and accurate visit management.
steps: Identify the visit to be cancelled in the system
Provide a reason for cancellation and confirm
Notify the visitor and host about the cancellation
cancelVisit.noteDescription: Effective communication of cancellations prevents confusion and ensures smooth operation.
cancelVisit.helpDescription: If you require assistance with cancelling a visit, our support team is ready to help.
cancelVisit.closingMessage: Manage visit schedules accurately with the EgyTwins system.

blockList.title: Manage Block List in EgyTwins System
blockList.description: Operators can manage and update the block list to ensure the safety and security of the premises.
steps: Access the block list module
Add or remove individuals or entities as needed
Ensure all changes are updated and saved
blockList.noteDescription: Managing the block list is crucial for maintaining a secure environment in the facility.
blockList.helpDescription: For any inquiries or help regarding the block list, our security team is available for assistance.
blockList.closingMessage: Keep your environment safe with effective block list management.
